website_summaries.verdict: If you want an alternative to the traditional coffee table for a smaller room, this is one to consider.
pros: Sleek, streamlined design doesn't consume much space
cons: The compact size may not be suitable for spacious living rooms

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I read a few of the reviews here before ordering, deciding to take a chance on the quality because the design of the table appealed to me so much. I’m glad I did. Yes, the frosted glass is touchy, but I knew that ahead of time & was careful. Yes, the stickers were a pain to remove, but I managed it. At first I thought it was going to be quite rickety, with the feet seeming uneven, but I finally realized I hadn’t screwed the legs all the was in, lol. After that, I had no trouble putting it together & while it probably won’t last 50 years like my last coffee table, it is just fine for camp.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with this purchase Item size is perfect if ...
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this purchase Item size is perfect if you have a small living room Item quality is excellent, and price is too Package was very well protected during shipping Very very easy to assemble, takes 10 mins Beautiful beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with the Easy instructions and also the finished product ...
customer_reviews.text: I am always a little intimidated when it comes to putting any furniture piece together -not just for the challenge of it as I am not Bob the Builder but also because of how it will appear once done.... rest assured on this one. .I am so pleased with the Easy instructions and also the finished product it is perfect... it is small in size for those with small spaces...it is simple yet modern ...and it is glass...super super pleased...especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong version but I still like it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the version with the oval at the bottom and 2 tiered pieces on top. Unfortunately I received the version that’s an oval at the top and 2 opaque tiered pieces underneath. You can’t just assemble it the other way because of which glass is opaque and where there are holes for the legs to come through. I decided it would wasn’t worth the hassle to exchange and it’s still a very nice table, I didn’t notice any damage to the glass in the shipping process. Cute and the right size for a decorative coffee table for my front sitting room. It was very easy to assemble and everything fit well into place.
customer_reviews.author: wolfskitty

customer_reviews.title: what happened?
customer_reviews.text: [ bought this table 2 years ago and have been in love with it, stylish and chic. yesterday I came home and found the middle frosted shelf completely shattered. no one was home and as far as I know my super had not been in for any reason. the shelf was not just cracked but completely shattered like auto glass. I live on the ocean but my doors and windows were closed and the ac was on., so strong winds were not an issue.certainly never had any issues with it before. this could have been very dangerous to anyone at home. it may be idiotic of me to buy the table again but I will. caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: r hames

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: I thought of getting a small round table (even found some 24 - 30 inches!), but an oval shape is more space efficient. I put this table together by myself (I'm a petite-but-strong female) using the super-easy instructions. The only con (and this is likely just me), is that there's a gap between the middle and bottom shelves which I would've preferred not to see for mostly aesthetic reasons. Still, the price makes this coffee table a steal and no shipping charge! So glad I didn't buy an almost $500 round table, since I'm just as happy with this below $100 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Free bird

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table almost six years ago. It looks good, and the size is right for a small space, but the top comes loose from the posts over time. Only one of four is still attached by the cheap glue. As a short-term solution it's fine. Definitely not long-term, and I sure wouldn't pay full price for it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Beyond what I expected. Some of the reviews said it was a bit too low or something but it is just perfect to us.
customer_reviews.author: Misael S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces! I have a tight living room and wanted a table that was small but also light and bright on the eyes. The box showed up ripped and partially opened - delivered from UPS. Thankfully bc the seller packed each piece so well, it all arrived with no nicks, chips or scratches despite the really messed-up box. It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Figs5

customer_reviews.title: Great value for nice looking and sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: To begin- I would expect to pay more for just the slab of glass that makes up the top portion of this table. I have been putting together A LOT of furniture as I just moved and THIS piece was a breeze to assemble. Everything was in tact- the instructions were pretty straight forward and the table was constructed in about 15-20 minutes. The box is quite heavy so that is a consideration if you need to carry it far once it makes it to your doorstep. For a small living space, I can say that this is- by far- the BEST inexpensive furniture purchase I have made so far. Buy it- I doubt you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: arobin

customer_reviews.title: Modern coffee table
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in about 1 hour. Warning, the package is very heavy and I could only slide it across the porch to the door. We really like the table. It adds a lot to the sunroom. We are putting plants on the bottom tiers and one in the middle top. This will leave room for tea or coffee cups and a book or two.
customer_reviews.author: Dianamcc

customer_reviews.title: DON'T TOUCH THE FROSTED GLASS PIECES
customer_reviews.text: I lifted one piece of the "frosted" glass out of the box and the moisture from my thumb wiped out a portion of the "frosting". The table looks great, and is a really nice value. Just be careful handling the "frosted" glass cause that stuff just wipes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I like it! looks nice how ever this piece is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it! looks nice how ever this piece is excellent for a small living room area but will not look good on a large living area (1000 sft). other than that Im happy easy to put together. everyone loves it. Im happy
customer_reviews.author: Fierce2

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This table is unique, attractive, sturdy, just the right size and a great price. The tempered glass is thick and good quality. Only caveat: my grandson grabbed the underside of the bottom white opaque shelf and it discolored leaving a clear fingerprint. Bummer because I love this table.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tiny table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I wanted! Yes, it is small, so measure it out before you order to make sure it's the right size for your room. It's perfect in my tiny living room, looks very smart! It's very easy to put together...no tools and a woman can do it easily! The glass top is a bit heavy but that makes it sturdy. Excellent instructions, very clear, and a clever design. It looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Missing Piece BUT Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: Although the small cylinder # 6 was missing from the original packaging, I was able to go to the website and request it. I was still able to put the coffee table together, but seeing the space for the missing cylinder...my eye just draws directly to it...disappointing for a newly purchased item...HOWEVER, IT WILL BE PERFECT WHEN THE PIECE ARRIVES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great size, looks great, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table because I have new couches and they are in the shape of a box, the coffee table that I had was too boxy and took a lot of space of the in between of the new couches. This table fits perfectly, opens up space, looks great, and it is very sturdy. I am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, this coffee table. I've only had it for 4 months or so but so far, it has been great. Easy assembly and was up in minutes. It's a smaller one so if you want a really big coffee table like I see people have nowadays, I would look elsewhere. I like the frosted glass shelves underneath. That's where we keep our remote bin. We've recently discovered that our new cat also likes to lay on the other shelf so I guess it can do that as well! Otherwise, very sturdy table for the price. We set it on carpet and it doesn't seem to have a problem or tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for great quality cocktail table.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek modern look of my new cocktail table. Easy assembly, no tools required. Great size for smaller living rooms. Great price for a cocktail table of its quality. Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy coffee table. Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this after considering a lot of other options. The table is very sturdy. Only suggestion would be to improve the metal rings that are attached to metal rods as they look pretty bad (quality wise) on such a good table. Would have given 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Side Table, too!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Mid-Century Modern look. Very impressed with the quality ...and I’m picky! Very well made and perfect size as a functional side table for a large modern chair and ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: JG-CA

customer_reviews.title: Beware of stickers
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous.... the product barcode stickers they put on the table literally don’t come off. It looks awful and now I’m going to have to buy another product to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent product for the price. Only thing I had an issue with was that the last pieces of the legs to screw in weren't 100% straight. But since I have it on a rug, you can't tell at all. Quality is nice on the glass. Took about 20 minutes to put together. Fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: MDCollectibles

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was pretty damn sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that UPS would shatter my glass table in transit. Luckily they did not. The packaging was pretty damn sturdy. The box looked kinda beat, but the glass was fine. The metal rods and plastic rings all fine. Only a monkey wrench was needed to tighten everything up good. Months later my table is still standing. No cracks or scratches. Perfectly level. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: The company was great at helping with the return and did it very ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, some of the glass came completely shattered, but that was more from delivery than anything else. I returned it to buy a different table, as I needed one immediately, but from what I could tell, everything looked as pictured. The company was great at helping with the return and did it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Sturdy and Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my living room. It was delivered within 2-3 days all in one piece. I was nervous about glass being delivered but thankfully not a scratch or crack. Must have been the way it was packed that protected the table. I was able to put the table together myself without help, although a second hand would have been nice. I ordered the frosted wave bottoms bc it look more beach like, and I love everything about the beach and a good reach. I would definitely recommend buying if your looking to buying a glass coffee table that won’t break your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value!
customer_reviews.text: It's a small coffee table for a small space, but it matched my end table I previously purchased elsewhere PERFECTLY!! Easy to assemble as well... great modern look and inexpensive. I was worried about things scratching the glass top or candles/picture frames breaking from falling over so I purchased a nice serving tray to add texture and keep things in place. HAPPY customer!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Terri Center

customer_reviews.title: Idiot Proof
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly. All parts included. Best of all - easy to assemble without ...without tools. Just followed instructions and diagram carefully. Everything fit. Table looks good. It is perfect size for sitting in front of couch in smallish den where we watch TV. Intended as a coffee table. Glass is temper proof and has a solid feel. Nevertheless, I will probably add a cloth covering to the top so that when i put glassware on top it does not clink.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love the table...
customer_reviews.text: Table was easy to assemble and I cant assemble anything..lol Looks amazing I get many compliments and many think I paid more than I did for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Awer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartments or homes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a funky, modern edition to your living room! I absolutely love it and get so many compliments. Assembling it was no problem and it has stood sturdy and cute since I bought it. Has such a chic look.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Calametti

customer_reviews.title: Big impact for small price
customer_reviews.text: size is perfect and style is just right for our mid century vibe sectional. remarkable quality for this price ...don't let the low price turn you off
customer_reviews.author: designmad

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This table is small and does wonders in a corner or against the wall holding decorative items or pictures. I was actually pleased on how easy it was putting it together by myself, each piece is numbered with stickers which I recommend taking the stickers off as you place each piece in tack. It makes an easier clean up instead of going back peeling each sticker off after the table is put together.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small, broke rather quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty. Small but I guess I overestimated the size. One leg broke shortly after purchase (2 months after purchase). It is just limping now. I ordered it late one night and the next morning before 11 am it was already at my door. Wow
customer_reviews.author: Shamara Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the picture and easy to assemble it took me 15 mins. Updated comment: I gave the table 5 stars until one night I was sleeping and I heard a sudden bang! The bottom half of the table dropped to the floor and broke into thousands of pieces. I was pissed! I only had 4 magazines on top of the table. Never again! Please do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Uniquely designed!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and arrive without any damage at all. The stickers were placed in places that were easily removable. I love the tiered shelves at the bottom. This is a gorgeously crafted piece for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: @CeymiChic💕

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and space saving
customer_reviews.text: I sort of rolled the dice with this purchase but I couldn't be happier. It took about 15 minutes to assemble and is a great addition to my small Chicago apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Trey (but mostly Meg)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This just looks amazing; we are extremely happy to have purchased it. Assembly is easy, hardly takes few minutes. Table is pretty big and strong than we expected. Highly recommended to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds up that vibe! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you ask me if I'll buy this product, I'll definitely purchase another one! It made our living room elegant and spacious coz it is made of thick glass. The sticker was one issue but with thorough cleaning, it'll be removed with proper scrubbing. Setting up is very easy only took me 20mins. Product wise, it looks like it costs 400+ and very sturdy. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking table, and the size was perfect for the living room area. The materials are high quality and you do not need any tools to assemble the table. Each component comes numbered, and with detailed instructions to make it user friendly, even if you don't own any tools. It looks great and I am a happy customer. I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty disappointed. I would send it back but I ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is extremely small. I was pretty disappointed. I would send it back but I don't want the hassle of it. It just got put aside. I need something bigger. I can't see it being good for even a very small room. The design is cute but needs to be alot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complemented our contemporary furniture
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new living room set and this piece complemented the contemporary style. Assembly was simple and directions were well documented. Quality was as expected and shipped without damage; packing was exceptional to avoid damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but still a cute little coffee table. Super easy to put together (15 minutes, tops) and very attractive once completed. No damage/flaws to the product upon receipt and it has held up well over the last few weeks I've had it. The bottom pieces are frosted glass that appear periwinkle or gray-ish depending on the light.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table for a really good price. Sturdy and great room accent.
customer_reviews.author: Terif

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, and makes my apartment feel a bit more updated. The box arrived banged up, but to my surprise the table was not damaged. I have noticed the "tempered glass" is prone to losing whatever paint is present, but for the price it is to be expected. Overall I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful table mine is kinda wobbly not sure if I did it or not which is why gave 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Check with seller before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Yes I purchased this used however i didn't expect for the product to be missing a screw that would fit in the table. I believed that should have been mentioned that way the customer know what to expect with a used item.
customer_reviews.author: diamondiva

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a centre table - for a few good reasons, keep finger food when I entertain friends, keep my magazines and remotes, for my day to day usage. I needed to accomplish all of this with a piece of furniture, that doesnt occupy much space in the limited living room space of my apartment. I also needed something that wasnt either antique looking (to match my decor) NOR something way too fancy. This table fit the bill smack. I wasnt sure till I assembled it (which was quite easy) and now I am really PLEASED with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bluekoolkruiser

customer_reviews.title: looks expensive and elegant
customer_reviews.text: The table looks exactly like the picture. It looks great with leather sofa. The glass quality is very good and looks expensive (not cheap at all) It arrived yesterday in perfect condition with all the parts. The best part is, it does not require any tools for assembling and is very easy to assemble. Me and my wife took only 15-20 mins to do so. The instructions were easy to follow. Just remember to assemble it tightly. Once done, It is very sturdy. The only reason I have given 4 stars is coz it is more tapering at ends than I expected. A must buy for small living room.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Semwal

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture! Easy to assemble no need for a tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kameelah

customer_reviews.title: Small coffee table
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my living room. It’s smaller than I was thinking. It is not that study and is difficult to slide on carpet. Besides the glass, the frame and rods are not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a little smaller than I thought but it makes my living room look so much bigger! It was relatively easy to put together. It's very modern looking - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Peak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this small glass table; perfect for the space. Love the top with the two tiers rather than the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smaller table
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I would have liked, (not their fault!) but it’s really pretty. It goes well in my beach themed house. Assembled fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and well built
customer_reviews.text: It's ugly but well made. We chose it because it's easy to clean and nice round edges, these are great features with a toddler. The feet are adjustable which is essential with the two center legs. The only slight downfall is the plastic cups that go between the leg sections and glass pieces are a bit cheesy. The parting line for the mold is very evident with excess plastic pushed out.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck in New England

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Our original table was broken in a move. Finding the matching replacement was a pain since the store is not around anymore. This is a great stand-in. If it were a bit larger (longer) I'd rate it higher.
customer_reviews.author: Splorer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a small coffee table that is absolutely exquisite. Very well-made and very, very beautiful in a small space living room. Another bonus? Owners of fur-kids who shed a lot? There are no cracks or crannies for the for the fur to get caught in! Just a quick swipe with the swiffer duster and you're done. :-))
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Love the coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Not to difficult to assemble. Looks a lot like the picture. If you have a high sofa, it might be a little short. If you like glass, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Holt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!! Easy to set up and it is perfect for our room! Have received many compliments since adding to our room! Love the small size and it is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Sjeanine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartments
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of furniture, and for the price you can't beat it. Assembly is easy, requires no special tools and can be done in under an hour. I will say some of the separate pieces are very cheap but for the price, what'd you expect? Easy to clean, looks great and the perfect size for my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: Have this for a few years now. Even with little kids this has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Table at a Low Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table and sturdy. It's in my rec room and has grandkids climbing on it and it's holding up just fine. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Worth every cent. It was easy to out together and is a lovely size. I placed a 16oz bottle H2O to give an idea of its size. I truly like it. It is on a 4x6 rug.
customer_reviews.author: Mlle Gia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had this coffee table for a while now. It survived a move and is pretty sturdy. The legs are kind of cheap feeling. Classic school desk rods honestly. Everything else is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey H

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived shattered to smithereens- I didn't even open the box, and I found pieces of glass all over my apartment for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Candiray

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice table for an small room
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price but smaller than expected, it's a nice table for an small room. We thought it was a bit bigger though. Sometimes is not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Twergen

customer_reviews.title: Classy look, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size table, easy to put together, good instructions, glass packed well, nothing cracked or broken. Smooth edges around top glass, love the levels for stuff like remotes. Very pleased, great price too.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN VOGLE

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It looks so modern and sheek and looks just like the picture. You do have to assemble it which is hard if you don't have the right pieces but if you're good with that kind of stuff I would suggest buying it! way cheaper than getting it from a store..a bit smaller than I expected but it is still so cute! thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Jurewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a decent price. The table looks very modern and I enjoy the fact that it has lower bottom shelves where I can store things (coasters, remotes, magazine coffee table books) rather than having clutter on the table. Took me about 10 minutes to build. No extra tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: U won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is really an awesome table. Especially if u have a tiny room. Visually it still helps the room look bigger as it’s a glass. Looks more expensive and the Wave makes it look unique. It perfectly fits with my L shaped couch. I’m happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr N.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Made my old, tiny, new york apt look like some fancy mansion.... really looks elegant and beautifull, a steal of a deal!! Plus super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time, putting it together took maybe 20 mins by myself, instructions were extremely clear. The glass pieces are not flimsy but really thick and weighted with bevelled edges. Beautiful piece for a small space. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Christie

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but bad packing and no instructions
customer_reviews.text: A+ for looks. Would have given this 5 stars if this had come with any sort of instructions at all. Also, as mentioned in other reviews the stickers do not come off easily. Going to have to go get some goo gone to get the residue off. Otherwise a solid piece of furniture looks nice in living rooom
customer_reviews.author: cdb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this table. Easy to put together. A little small but definitely love it. Glad it's not super big. It's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Paige H

customer_reviews.title: A plus in my living room.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect table for small living room. It was easy to assemble. I'm very happy with it. I would definitely recommend anyone who is doubting to get it. You will not regret it. The design is special and the material is of good quality. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Dega

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: the could have better hardware that might make a little more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Good value, and pretty descent quality for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, goes together fairly easily. Lining up the round inserts is a bit of a challenge. When you insert the long bolts, use plyers to snug up, but don't crank down too hard. If these aren't snug the table will wobble.
customer_reviews.author: larrys32545

customer_reviews.title: Decent table
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller then expected but decent table and super easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Coffee Table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Easy to put together (about 10 min), every part is quality and the size is perfect for my sofa. I get lots of compliments on it from friends who visit.
customer_reviews.author: genecelh

customer_reviews.title: Classy & Glassy
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it. It was smaller than I anticipated. Easy to assemble and those instructional stickers should be less adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Person Me

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture smaller in person
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very easy and simple to put together no tools needed / smaller than expected still please with quality and shipping
customer_reviews.author: Keashia

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Its as pretty in person as in the picture! It is surprisingly very sturdy, and very thick. It was easy for me to put together especially since I'm not a handy kind of person. The only thing I didn't think about when buying this was the amount of cleaning I would need to do. Its glass so youre going to see all the fingerprints and smudges etc. But I really like this product and I always get a compliment on it when someone visits.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Throw a magazine and a vase with dried flowers on top and change the whole look of the room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Greene

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for small offices!
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for my home office! So funky and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Bought it as a housewarming gift for a friend. Liked it so much I bought another for my new place. Graceful lines, doesn't take up visual space, and practical multi-tier shelving. Oh -and extremely reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of crap. I literally could not give it away for free :-(
customer_reviews.author: She~Ra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Goes perfect in my living room I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small living room area, looks classy and elegant! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Supringsly Cute
customer_reviews.text: This table surprised me with how beautiful and classy it looks for the price. Very impressed and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josanne Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love love my table. The glass is real glass and heavy. So durable easy to put together if you can read.
customer_reviews.author: Gezzy

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Its smaller than a regular size table. I live in a downtown condo and space is a premium. Its hard to find smaller scale furniture for city condos without paying a small ransom for it. It assembles in about 15 min from box to finish. No tools needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: The Table is Really nice
customer_reviews.text: i like the table its not little little but i should have gotten the one with the wave at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Shay Marks

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BUT CUTE coffee table !!
customer_reviews.text: This table is ssoooooo cute ! When arriving the box makes it seem bigger than it really is so be aware of the dimensions of the table . It’s small ! But for an apartment or small living space (like office or so) it works great . Once my apartment was filled up with other furniture , the table brought the room together and made my living room look so chic. With the right accents and decorations it’s really an eye catching piece :) !
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Awsome price great table.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and very easy to install, no tools needed. Did it in less than 30 min. Very good looking, just a little short, a little more height 2 inches wouldve been great but I can make fix it by adding some height adjuster. Still a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: s&p

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect small space coffee table. It looks good, easy to assemble and the glass cleans up nicely. Please look at the dimensions. This table compliments a love seat but would be lost in a large space with a full couch. Perfect for my small TV area.
customer_reviews.author: J English

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small and low.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but small. Not for a large living room. Better for a small apartment or office setting. Fairly heavy and seems stable. Seems slightly lower than most coffee tables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great modern table and the glass makes ti look like it's taking up less room in a small place. Have had many comments.Assembly takes minutes. Can hold many plants or knick knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Cama

customer_reviews.title: Great little table... very attractive design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Love the design. We put it in a small nook of the home and it fits in perfectly there. I do wish the table were about 1 - 2 inches wider but overall extremely happy with the purchase. Incredibly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: U. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this to be sent to my mother. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to be sent to my mother. My brother was able to assemble it quickly and with ease. It's a nice-looking table and certainly looks more expensive than the price.
customer_reviews.author: C.Grider

customer_reviews.title: Apartment coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This goes together easily, looks good and leaves room for human traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: Came home one day and it had randomly shattered. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Modern Oval Coffee Accent Table Living Room, Wave Bottom, Clear Glass
product_meta.description: Style Name:Oval Coffee TableThis stylish coffee table offers multiple levels to showcase your magazines and books and provides a durable foundation for your morning coffee in your living room. Its distinct metal tapered legs support the three tempered safety glass shelves. The layered glass shelves give a subtle sleek and elegant appeal to your living space, while also having a Mid century modern design. Features two frosted lower shelves, each having beveled edges for a soft, smooth look.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 17" H x 38" L x 20" W
Made of beveled, tempered safety Glass shelves
Frosted finish on one shelf and sparkling Steel legs
